pr_title: Expose context in async apache HTTP client instrumentation

timeline.message: Expose context in async apache HTTP client instrumentation

timeline.bodyText: can you add a comment here about why this method exists? I'm worried someone (e.g. me) will remove it since it's unused
timeline.author: trask

replies.bodyText:
+1 added a comment.
There will be probably more instrumentations that do not expose the context which makes it impossible for extending instrumentations to access the current span.
replies.author: pavolloffay
